## Introduction
My name is <a href="https://www.linkedin.com/in/dang-kevin/">Kevin Dang</a> and I am a graduate student at the University of Toronto Dalla Lana School of Public Health, pursuing a Master of Science in Biostatistics with an Emphasis in Artificial Intelligence and Data Science Option. I also hold a Bachelor's degree from the University of Toronto in Applied Statistics and a minor in Mathematics, conferred in Spring 2020. Currently, I am a Teaching Assistant for courses in the Dalla Lana School of Public Health,  Department of Computer Science and Department of Statistical Sciences. I am also working at St. Michael's Hospital for my biostatistics practicum.

<br>
